about_the_game:
9 Ways: Hentai Harem is a simple and relaxing 2D puzzle game where each level consists of a puzzle made up of parts of beautiful artwork. Your goal is to assemble all the pieces and restore the image. The game is perfect for those looking for a calm and laid-back experience without any stressful moments. With each completed puzzle, you'll enjoy the process that helps you unwind and escape from everyday worries.

Key Features:

  • Simplicity and Accessibility: The game is not difficult, making it a great choice for those who just want to relax and have fun. Suitable for players of all levels.

  • One-Handed Play: The game is simple enough to be played with just one hand, making it ideal for playing in any comfortable setting.

  • Pleasant Atmosphere: Calm and harmonious music, combined with smooth sound effects, creates a relaxing and cozy ambiance.

  • Unique Artwork: Each image you assemble is original and highly detailed, making the puzzle-solving experience even more enjoyable.

  • Multiple Levels: Each level presents a new puzzle with a unique artwork, adding variety and keeping the gameplay fresh.

  • 11 Achievements: Earn achievements as you progress, adding a layer of motivation and fun to your experience.

  • No Rush: There are no time limits in this game, so you can enjoy the process at your own pace without feeling rushed.

  • Low System Requirements: The game is optimized to run on most computers, making it accessible even on older or less powerful devices.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains explicit depictions of characters who gradually become more undressed as the player progresses, up to full nudity. Some levels and stages also include scenes of consensual sexual acts between characters. All characters depicted in the game are over 18 years old. The game does not feature any scenes of sexual violence, non-consensual acts, or other violent or abusive content. The primary focus of the game is on solving puzzles and visual progression of the characters.

name: 9 Ways : Hentai Harem

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics (Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Works on most older systems
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel UHD Graphics 620 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 620 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Optimized for modern laptops and desktops

short_description: 9 Ways: Hentai Harem is a relaxing 2D puzzle game where you assemble pieces of artwork to restore a complete image! The perfect game for unwinding with a pleasant atmosphere, unique artwork, and simple mechanics.
